name: Kouti
description:
Protect The Statue

From Everything and Anything

No Matter What Happens

CONTROLS

--WASD or Arrows to Move--

--Z or J to Jump--

--X or K to Run/Use Power Up--

CREDITS

Game by Alej (Me):

https://twitter.com/4AleJ1

Music by Patrick de Arteaga:

https://patrickdearteaga.com/

This Game it's a English Translation for Kouti

You Can Play the Spanish version, Here:

https://gamejolt.com/games/Kouti/513805

Thanks for Playing! :D
